channel.title: daily on Santiago Forero
channel.description: Recent content in daily on Santiago Forero

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Day: 1 Date: Tuesday, May 5, 2021 Dear readers, Today is the first day of my e-diary, a project that aims to document my life and share thoughts and ideas. I woke up at around 6:40 in the morning, took a shower, brushed my teeth and started my virtual school day, I do not enjoy virtual classes anymore, I’m tired of them, I believe that 1.5+ years of virtual school is enough for me, I cannot wait to go to the irl school.
